Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Enacts "Averyana's law" to provide a tax credit for the installation of certain smoke alarms
Summary: Enacts "Averyana's law"; provides a tax credit for the purchase and installation of certain smoke alarms which incorporate photoelectric technology including but not limited to: photoelectric detectors; and photoelectric/carbon monoxide detectors.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to enacting "Averyana's law"
